title: DICES 2048 3D
description: You are a fan of challenging puzzle games, but can't find one which features the beatuy of 3D? Then you should get ready for Dices 2048 3D! Dices 2048 3D features the classic 2048 gameplay: Match 2 blocks of the same number to add them together and create a block with an even higher number. But it's no that easy in 3D! You can shoot the blocks not only horizontaly, but also stack them on top of each other. And it gets even more challenging! Every now and then mighty stones appear blocking your way. The only thing you can do is either wait until they disappear after some shots or use the powerful bombs to destroy them! Get ready and prepare your brains for some serious but awesome challenges!
